document_data.name: ''Hornblades''
document_data.creator: [[Mielikki]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Hornblades''''' were the twin favored weapons of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] [[goddess]] [[Mielikki]], the Supreme Ranger.
document_data.Description: Each was a [[scimitar]]-sized As scimitars, they weighed {{SI|4|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Abilities:
After the [[Time of Troubles]] of [[1358 DR]], her swords were noted to be regular ''hornblades +3''. When shared with mortals, one functioned as a ''[[rod of alertness]]'' and the other as a ''[[rod of security]]'', both with the full fifty charges.

After the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the ''Hornblades'' were each ''+5 [[defending]] [[Holy (weapon quality)|holy]] [[keen]] [[mighty cleaving]] scimitars''.
document_data.Uses:
Though Mielikki was skilled in fighting with her ''Hornblades'', she rarely actually used them, as she did not engage in melee often, and favored her fists when she did. She would rather rely on her own skills and magic and her [[longbow]], named ''[[Hartsong]]''.

She sometimes lent these weapons to mortal [[ranger]]s who embarked on great quests on her behalf.

Based on the ''Hornblades'', the scimitar was the favored weapon of Mielikkian [[cleric]]s.
